last_episode_to_air.name: Klaas Bruinsma: Europe’s Hash King
last_episode_to_air.overview: Thought by many to be a pushover due to his boyish looks and wealthy upbringing, Klaas Bruinsma proves himself a sadistic and sinister drug lord.

name: Drug Lords
overview: Witness the stories of history's most notorious kingpins, their terrifying enforcers, and the men and women who've sworn to bring them down.

episodes.name: Pablo Escobar
episodes.overview: Colombian drug lord Pablo Escobar leads a horrific war against his own country until a team of politicians and police end his reign of terror.

episodes.name: The Cali Cartel
episodes.overview: Gilberto and Miguel Rodríguez Orejuela use violence and guile to turn the Cali Cartel into a $7 billion-per-year criminal operation.

episodes.name: Frank Lucas & The Country Boys: Heroin Kings of New York
episodes.overview: Frank Lucas does whatever it takes to become -- and remain -- the heroin king of New York. Meanwhile, three dedicated cops vow to bring him down.

episodes.name: The Pettingill Clan: Australia’s Heroin Dynasty
episodes.overview: A mother and her sadistic boys rule the Australian underworld until the eldest son's addiction hastens the family's downfall.

episodes.name: El Chapo
episodes.overview: After idolizing drug lords as a child, Joaquín "El Chapo" Guzmán becomes one of history's most notorious kingpins, known for his audacious escapes.

episodes.name: Jemeker Thompson: Crack Queen of L.A
episodes.overview: Once the undisputed crack queen of LA, Jemeker Thompson speaks about her unorthodox reign and how her maternal instinct led to her downfall.

episodes.name: Christopher Coke: Jamaica’s Narco Prince
episodes.overview: Driven by an all-consuming desire for power, Jamaica's Christopher Coke considers himself a modern-day Robin Hood -- until authorities take him down.

episodes.name: Klaas Bruinsma: Europe’s Hash King
episodes.overview: Thought by many to be a pushover due to his boyish looks and wealthy upbringing, Klaas Bruinsma proves himself a sadistic and sinister drug lord.
